abstract: Yoshikatsu Kawaguchi (川口 能活, Kawaguchi Yoshikatsu, born August 15, 1975), sometimes referred to as Yoshi Kawaguchi, is a Japanese footballer who plays as a goalkeeper. He is a former captain of the Japan national team.Current, he plays in FC Gifu in J. League Division 2.
